h:head.h:title: 2. BOTSWANA SCH/STH Mid Term Evaluation - Children Form

text.value: The code must be a two-digit number between 9 and 91
The code must be a two-digit number between 99 and 901
Did the child give assent, and parent or guardian consent?
How will the individual's unique ID be generated?
Please record the following unique ID code for the respondent on a separate list and on each diagnostic test(s) administered, including RDT and Dry Blood Spot tests
The age must be between 4 and 16 years
When you are at school, where do you usually go to urinate?
Do you wash your hands after urinating?
If no, why don't you wash your hand after urinating
I don't think it is important
When you are at school, where do you usually go to defecate?
Do you wash your hands after urinating?
If no, why don't you wash your hand after urinating
I don't think it is important
Which of the following activities do you perform?
If there are water bodies (river, stream, canal, lake, dam etc)
You just entered a value that will end the survey
I don't think it is important
